content.question: A historian interpreting the policies advocated for in the passage would most likely argue that they are best explained in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The decreasing importance of mercantilist policies in the development of the global economy
The importance of raw materials to the development of industrial economies
The growing importance of Social Darwinist ideology in the development of imperial economies
The importance of access to coerced labor in the development of industrial economies

content.answer: The importance of raw materials to the development of industrial economies

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
